title: This Love
lyrics:
[intro] (G)  (Cm)  (Fm)  (G7)
 
(G) I was so high I did not (Cm)recognize
The fire burning (Fm)in her eyes
The chaos that con(G7)trolled my mind
(G) Whispered goodbye as she got (Cm)on a plane
Never to re(Fm)turn again
But always in my (G7)heart
 
[chorus]
(Cm) This (Fm)love has (Bb)taken its toll (Eb) on me
(Cm)She said good(Fm)bye too (Bb)many times  be(Eb)fore
(Cm) And her (Fm)heart is (Bb)breaking in (Eb)front of me
(Cm)I have no (Fm)choice cause (Bb)I won't say good(Ab)bye anymore (G)
Whoah…(Cm) whoah…. (Fm) whoah…. (G7)
 
(G) [pause] I tried my best to feed her (Cm)appetite
Keep her coming (Fm)every night
So hard to keep her (G7)satisfied
(G) Kept playing love like it was (Cm)just a game
Pretending to (Fm)feel the same
Then turn around and (G7)leave again oh
 
[chorus]
(Cm) This (Fm)love has (Bb)taken its toll (Eb) on me
(Cm)She said good(Fm)bye too (Bb)many times  be(Eb)fore
(Cm) And her (Fm)heart is (Bb)breaking in (Eb)front of me
(Cm)I have no (Fm)choice cause (Bb)I won't say good(Ab)bye anymore (G)
Whoah…(Cm) whoah…. (Fm) whoah…. (G7)
 
(Fm) I'll fix these broken things
(Cm) Repair your broken wings
(G7) And make sure everything's al(Cm)right  (it's alright, it’s alright)
(Fm) My pressure on her hips
(Cm) Sinking my fingertips
Into (G)every inch of you
Cause I (G7)know that's what you want me to do
 
[chorus]
(Cm) This (Fm)love has (Bb)taken its toll (Eb) on me
(Cm)She said good(Fm)bye too (Bb)many times  be(Eb)fore
(Cm) And her (Fm)heart is (Bb)breaking in (Eb)front of me
(Cm)I have no (Fm)choice cause (Bb)I won't say good(Ab)bye anymore (G)
Whoah…(Cm) whoah…. (Fm) whoah…. (G7)
 
(Cm) This (Fm)love has (Bb)taken its toll (Eb) on me
(Cm)She said good(Fm)bye too (Bb)many times  be(Eb)fore
(Cm) And her (Fm)heart is (Bb)breaking in (Eb)front of me
(Cm)I have no (Fm)choice cause (Bb)I won't say good(Ab)bye anymore (G)
(Cm)  (Fm)  (G7)  (Cm-single strum) [end]
